reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Ensuring sustainability and continuity of services for key populations and people living with HIV in the Republic of Kazakhstan

description.narrative: Kazakhstan - HIV - Kazakh scientific center of dermatology and infectious diseases of the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Kazakhstan - KSCDID. This program has the following goals: Strengthen sustainability and continuity of prevention, care and treatment services for HIV and AIDS in Kazakhstan. The objectives of this program are: Objective 1: Strengthening sustainable financing mechanisms. Objective 2: Strengthening comprehensiveness and quality of HIV prevention, treatment and care service-delivery models with a view to programmatic sustainability. Objective 3: Strengthen resilience of community and health systems. Objective 4: Creating enabling legal environments that support health and human rights of key and vulnerable populations and PLHIV

Coverage / Output indicator for KAZ-H-RAC
TCS-other 3: Number and percentage of PWIDs - PLHIV receiving combination antiretroviral therapy according to nationally approved treatment protocol
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
TCS-other 2: Number of PLHIV on treatment who have received services aimed at improving adherence to ART
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
KP-other 1: Number of PWIDs reached with substitution therapy
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
TCS-other 1: Number of PLHIV who received services aimed at motivation to initiate ART
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Outcome indicator for KAZ-H-RAC
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting condom use at last sex
HIV Other -1: Percentage of PWID who were tested for HIV in the last 12 months and who know the results
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Impact indicator for KAZ-H-RAC
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of other vulnerable populations (specify) who are living with HIV
